A Little Pasta A Day…  
Keeps The Doctor Away?
==============================================

> New study shows eating **PASTA** may actually help you **LOSE** weight.

Flip: Say What?

card_2.cardText:
> aThe study found that that pasta **didnat contribute to weight gain or increase in body fat**. In fact analysis actually showed a **small weight loss**.a
> 
> Dr John Sievenpiper, Lead Researcher

Flip To Rejoice!

card_3.cardText:
Study Details
-------------

*   Nearly **2,500** participants – ate a little more than **3 servings of pasta a week**.
*   Serving Size: **1/2 cup**.
*   Pasta replaced other carbs.
*   Pasta part of a broader **low glycemic** (low-GI) diet (i.e. no bread).

[Click: Low-GI foods](http://www.diabetes.org/food-and-fitness/food/what-can-i-eat/understanding-carbohydrates/glycemic-index-and-diabetes.html)

card_4.cardText:
But…Why Did Pasta Lead To Weight Loss?
--------------------------------------

Researchers aren’t 100% sure…but say : _“lower-GI foods have been shown to be **more satiating** and **delay hunger** and **decrease subsequent energy intake.**_

Translation? **A little pasta may have made eaters feel fuller, longer.**
